tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  RESPECTED
comments: This professor really cares about her students and is there for her students when they need her. I had an issue with some of my online courses and out of all the professors that I reached out to, she was the only one who truly helped me with my problem. I wish all professors at SFU were like her who genuinely cares about the students.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Had for 180 181 280 281. Teaches with even balance between reading+speaking. Tough language, so you need to put in the time. Completely fair marker; I got a B but was taking 6 courses my first semester while working, would have gotten an A or higher otherwise. Clear, informative and interactive lectures. 2 cheap texts for each level, with workbook

comments: pretty good prof, very nice and understanding, prepares and tells you what will be on a test or exam. has a lot of background information on many words or concepts that she teaches, which helps you understand better. if you keep on top of homework and studying vocab, you\'ll def get an A in this class. :)

comments: Lots of textbook usage is required, and she gives lots and lots of assignments, as if we wer in HS. She gives a short ltmd time for the quizzes, which I think is way too hard (full page,about 3 paragraphs of chinese reading)& fill in the blanks, even as a chinese heirtage speaker! I hoped that we skip the textbook & teach more aboutchinese cultures

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I took the intensive classes CHIN 290+291. She is awesome. The pace/workload/fairness in grading is perfect. Really good at teaching always able to help. Most importantly, she is so clear; it\'s impossible to misunderstand her. One of my favourite profs.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Caring (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Excellent teacher, very friendly and dedicated to her students. It is very easy to get along with her and she throws in (and tolerates) plenty of humour in her classes.
